snippet: Brazilian hackers claimed credit for taking down the Citigroup and Citibank Web sites. A Citigroup spokesman confirmed that its consumer site had experienced a temporary outage but said Citigroup had been able to restore Web site operations within...
abstract: Brazilian hackers claimed credit for taking down the Citigroup and Citibank Web sites. A Citigroup spokesman confirmed that its consumer site had experienced a temporary outage but said Citigroup had been able to restore Web site operations within one hour and was continuing to monitor its systems.

headline.main: Anonymous Says It Knocked Citigroup Sites Offline
